import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function CartTotal({value}) { const { cartSubTotal,cartTax,cartTotal,clearCart } = value; console.log("what means>>",this.props); return (
subtotal : Rs {cartSubTotal}
VAT(13%) : Rs {cartTax}
Total : Rs {cartTotal}
) }
